ygData.subject: RE: Roleplaying
ygData.msgSnippet: ... of ... My best one along these lines was trying to run from Solusek back to Freeport after a long dungeoncrawl.  When I zoned into Nektulos Forest, I
ygData.messageBody:
>But when you play until you are totally fatigued - you find yourself doing
>dumb stuff. Like getting lost in cities you normally know like the back
of
>your hand. Or all of a sudden you wonder - did they change this zone?
>Misty thicket never looked like this before, Hmmm. Or you have to do "/w
>sylly all" just to find out what zone you are in.

My best one along these lines was trying to run from Solusek back to
Freeport after a long dungeoncrawl. When I zoned into Nektulos Forest, I
managed to space and think I was in East Commons. (The two zones look SO
much alike... NOT!) So I turned left instead of right. Didn't realize my
mistake until I got to the gates of Neriak and had 3 guards jump me.
Fortunately, they didn't stun me too many times, so I was able to escape
and make it back to the zoneline with a bubble of health left.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
